Context: At George Brown College, there are three ways to get more information and tour the campuses: 1) general campus tours for prospective students and their families, 2) program-specific information sessions, and 3) orientation sessions for accepted students. The college offers various facilities including cafeterias, fitness centers, athletics facilities, student services, and classrooms and labs. Prospective students can contact George Brown College at 416-415-2000 or TTY: 1-877-515-5559, or email ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The college has a social media hub that can be visited. The information on the website is subject to change without notice and should not be viewed as a representation, offer, or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements. There is an invitation to learn more about the college's land acknowledgment and to sign up for updates on application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more.
